title: Down to needing ONE LAST t204...paying well for Carrigan!!
author: shammus

posts.post_title: Down to needing ONE LAST t204...paying well for Carrigan!!
posts.post_content:
Just down to these 20 commons and I complete my t204 project.  Hoping to purchase the following -

Beebe, Burchell, Byrnes, Carrigan, Clymer, Crandall, Ganley, Graham, Hemphill, Kahoe, Manning,  McCormick, Milan, Mitchell, Morgan, Raymond, Sallee, Smith, Stephens, Sweeney

I'd prefer lowgrade, beat or trimmed cards but will consider everything.  Thanks in advance,
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]

Picked up a few more t204s and now down to needing just 14....in shouting distance of completion now - just needing a few more to wrap this set up!

Beebe, Burchell, Carrigan, Graham, Hemphill, Kahoe, Manning, McCormick, Milan, Morgan, Raymond, Smith, Stephens, Sweeney

Thanks in advance,
Brian

Down to just 12 now....getting closer....any help is appreciated!

Beebe, Burchell, Carrigan, Graham, Hemphill, Manning, Milan, Morgan, Raymond, Smith, Stephens, Sweeney

Down to the final 10 cards!  Paying strong prices for the following -
Beebe, Burchell, Carrigan, Graham, Manning, Milan, Morgan, Raymond, Smith, Sweeney 

Thanks much!
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]
Still searching for any of these 10, any and all help is appreciated!

I have a Bugs Raymond.

Thanks.

Chris
[url]staindsox@hotmail.com[/url]

Still needing those same 10 cards! Paying strong prices for the following -
Beebe, Burchell, Carrigan, Graham, Manning, Milan, Morgan, Raymond, Smith, Sweeney 

Thanks much!
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]

I've come a LONG way on this project and the end is definitely in reach.  Down to needing just four final t204 commons -  Beebe, Carrigan, Morgan and Raymond.  Thanks much!

Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]

Bump....got this project down to two cards remaining and then it's on to focusing on the e107s!

Paying well for Carrigan or Raymond and I even have a t204 Keeler I could offer up as trade.  As always, trimmed cards, beat cards and absolutely destroyed cards are welcome....whatever gets the set complete :)

Bump....I'm at the very end of this project....I have 104 of the 105 t204s that I need and am down to the very final one.  Just need the Carrigan and I'll be done.  Anybody have this final card?  Thanks to everyone that's helped me get to this point!!

-Brian
Still need that final card and then my entire t204 project is complete.  I know somebody's got it....Carrigan ain't all that tough :).  Who can help me with this one final card?

Hey bro, did a quick lookie for ya, may  any of this help you out to complete it.

This site below has a PSA 4 
[url]https://msbsportscards.com/msbsportscards/content/1909-t204-ramly-bill-rough-carrigan-boston-red-sox[/url]

Also a search found this T206.org guy, but not know if for sale PSA2:
[url]http://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/Soxinseven/past-cards[/url]

Tghen of course theres HA with a 20 card collection at the end of the month:
[url]http://sports.ha.com/itm/baseball/1909-t204-ramly-psa-graded-collection-20-/p/7135-188992.s[/url]

Hi Chris, thank you again for providing those options for me!

Unfortunately, I'm still needing that Carrigan.  Just this one final t204 and then I can stop nagging people for t204s altogether....thanks all!
